useCase.name: Accessing digital archive
useCase.description: Researcher accesses the digital archive to view item details.

preconditions.precondition: Researcher has access to the digital archive.

useCase.trigger: Researcher initiates the process by accessing the digital archive.

mainSequence.step: Researcher requests to view item details.
Database returns metadata including digitization date.
Web interface shows item details including digitization date.
